import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Remove sensitive flag from ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/mark-not-sensitive"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes the sensitive information flag from a ticket, restoring normal visibility settings. After removal, the ticket will appear in standard searches and reports without the privacy restrictions that were previously applied.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with sensitive flag filter to find marked tickets and extract `Items[].TicketId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Find sensitive tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with `HasSensitiveInformation: true` filter → extract `TicketId`
2. Review: Confirm the sensitive designation is no longer needed
3. Remove flag: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/mark-not-sensitive](/docs/api/tickets/mark-ticket-not-sensitive)
4. Verify: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) to confirm `HasSensitiveInformation: false`

**Use Cases**: Declassifying tickets after investigation completion, correcting mistakenly flagged tickets, restoring visibility for reporting purposes.

**Note**: Removing the sensitive flag makes the ticket visible to users who may not have seen it previously. Ensure this is appropriate before proceeding.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/mark-sensitive](/docs/api/tickets/mark-ticket-sensitive) – Mark ticket as sensitive
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) – Filter by sensitive status
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) – View ticket sensitivity status
